WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 28 JAN BY
   M/V BGP CHALLENGER TOWING 12000 METER LONG CABLE
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   28-28S 042-08W, 27-58S 044-00W,
   27-54S 044-15W, 27-50S 044-30W,
   27-50S 044-39W, 27-50S 044-49W,
   27-51S 044-57W, 27-17S 045-44W,
   27-13S 045-40W, 27-08S 045-36W,
   27-04S 045-33W, 27-00S 045-29W,
   26-56S 045-25W, 26-37S 044-45W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 29 JAN 18.
